text: @NYGovCuomo @ChrisCuomo Please bring #DrAnthonyFauci onto your daily #coronavirus briefing. Just take over — like in basketball 🏀 “steal the ball”!!! Takeover leading the #coronaviruspandemic respinse. Please!!! @NYGovCuomo
